Class StyleConstants.FontConstants

java.lang.Object
javax.swing.text.StyleConstants
javax.swing.text.StyleConstants.FontConstants
All Implemented Interfaces:
AttributeSet.CharacterAttribute, AttributeSet.FontAttribute
Enclosing class:
StyleConstants
public static final class StyleConstants.FontConstants extends StyleConstants implements AttributeSet.FontAttribute, AttributeSet.CharacterAttribute
This is a typesafe enumeration of the well-known attributes that contribute to a font. These are aliased by the outer class for general presentation.
